skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You will find here all the news, update, coming sessions and special events of Saudi Cloud User group.
What you need to know, just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing?" and Alexa will connect us.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
